Translations.Text: Abo abaakafuwala nebaggya abantu ku kkubo lya Katonda (Katonda) yayonoona emirimu gyabwe

Ate abo abakkiriza nebakola emirimu emirongoofu era nebakkiriza ebyo ebyassibwa ku Muhammad, era nga gâ€™emazima agava ewa Mukama omulabirizi waabwe (abo Katonda) yabasangulako ebisobyo byabwe era naalongoosa embeera yaabwe

Ekyo kiri bwekityo lwakuba nti mazima bo abaakafuwala baagoberera ebitali bituufu, ate nga abo abakkiriza baagoberera amazima agava eri Mukama omulabirizi waabwe, bulijjo Katonda bwatyo akubira abantu ebifaananyi byabwe (bagerageranye)

Olwo bwe muba nga musisinkanye abo abaakafuwala (mu lutalo) muteme ensingo, okutuusiza ddala nga mubanafuyizza, munyweze empingu (zemusiba nazo abawambe) olwo nno kiri gyemuli okubata oluvanyuma (lwo kubawamba) oba okubakkiriza okwenunula, (ekyo mukikole bwemutyo) okutuusa olutalo lweruggwa. Ekyo bwekityo bwekiri, naye singa Katonda yayagala yandibewangulidde, wabula (ekimugaana okukola ekyo) lwakwagala kugezesa bamu mu mmwe ng'akozesa abalala. Era abo abattibwa nga bali mu kulwana mu kkubo lya Katonda, (Katonda) tagenda kwonoona mirimu gyabwe
Ajja kubalungamya era alongoose nembeera yaabwe
Era abayingize e jjana gyeyabategeeza edda
Abange mmwe abakkiriza singa mutaasa Katonda, ajja kubataasa, era anyweze ebigere byammwe (abagumye)
N'abo abaakafuwala okuzikirira kube ku bo, era Katonda yayonoona emirimu gyabwe
Ekyo lwakuba nti mazima bo bakyawa ebyo Katonda byeyassa, olwo nno nayonoona emirimu gyabwe
Abaffe tebatambula mu nsi, olwo nno ne balaba nga bweyali enkomerero yaabo abaaliwo oluberyeberye lwabwe, (anti) Katonda yabazikiriza. Era abo abaakafuwala ba kutuukwako ekiringa ekyo
Ekyo nno lwakuba nti mazima Katonda ye mukuumi wa bakkiriza era nga ddala abakafiiri tebalina mukuumi
